Annex with the list of IGOs (@doi:10.1177/0022343319881175) and 
countries (@cow_2015) included on this package.


## IGOs included

```{r }
library(igoR)

igo <- igo_search()
knitr::kable(igo[, c(1:4)])

```

## Countries included

```{r }

cc <- cow_country_codes
knitr::kable(cc)

```
